name: PixelStyle Image
summary: A PSDB file is an image created using Effectmatrix PixelStyle, a photo editor and vector graphic creation tool. It contains one or more image, text, drawing, and/or adjustment layers that, when viewed together, comprise a finalized image. You can use PixelStyle to export the image a PSDB file contains as a .JPG , .PNG , .JP2 , .TIFF , .PDF , .BMP , .GIF , or .SVG file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
